short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check domain availability directly from Google Keyword Planner results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Finding the right domain is crucial to ensure your site stands out and is easily discoverable. With PlannerDomainCheck, you no longer need to switch between the Google Keyword Planner and a domain registrar to check availability. This extension seamlessly integrates with Google Keyword Planner, allowing you to instantly verify domain availability right within your keyword results.

Why use PlannerDomainCheck?

Efficiency: Save time by avoiding manual checks on domain registrars. Directly see if your desired keyword domain is available.
Accuracy: Powered by GoDaddy's trusted domain checking API, you get reliable results every time.
Simplicity: With an intuitive design, even those new to SEO and domain registration can easily understand and benefit from its features.
Ensure you never miss out on the perfect domain for your next project. Install PlannerDomainCheck today and streamline your domain search process.
